HediffDef.label: animal prosthetic leg
HediffDef.description: An installed animal prosthetic leg. While it lacks a neural interface, its complex arrangement of internal joints allows it to mimic natural movement quite convincingly. Still, it is inferior to a real leg.
HediffDef.extraTooltip: Provides a Scratch attack with a strength and cooldown identical to the animal's original leg / paws / claws attack.

HediffDef.label: animal prosthetic arm
HediffDef.description: An installed animal prosthetic arm. While it lacks a neural interface, its complex arrangement of internal joints allows it to mimic natural movement quite convincingly. Still, it is inferior to a real arm.
HediffDef.extraTooltip: Provides a Blunt attack with a strength and cooldown identical to the animal's original fist attack.

HediffDef.label: animal prosthetic tail
HediffDef.description: An installed animal prosthetic tail, crafted to replace a lost or injured tail, providing support, balance, and expression while facilitating natural movement and comfort.

HediffDef.label: animal prosthetic jaw
HediffDef.description: An installed animal prosthetic jaw, tailored to restore oral function and aesthetics, enabling animals to eat, drink, and interact comfortably.

HediffDef.label: animal prosthetic heart
HediffDef.description: An installed animal prosthetic heart. It contains an electric motor that pumps blood smoothly around the body.

HediffDef.label: animal prosthetic spine
HediffDef.description: An installed animal prosthetic spine consisting of basic materials and rudimentary construction, offering modest support and mobility enhancement. Worse than an undamaged natural spine.

HediffDef.label: animal prosthetic stomach
HediffDef.description: An installed animal prosthetic stomach constructed from rudimentary materials, providing minimal digestive support. It lacks advanced features and offers a simple solution for basic nutrient processing, although it is worse than an undamaged natural stomach.

HediffDef.label: animal prosthetic lung
HediffDef.description: An installed animal prosthetic lung made with simple components, offering basic respiratory support. Despite its simplicity, it aids in oxygenation to a limited extent, supporting the animal's breathing function. Worse than an undamaged natural lung.

HediffDef.label: animal prosthetic kidney
HediffDef.description: An installed animal prosthetic kidney providing elementary filtration capabilities. Though lacking complexity, it offers a simple solution for waste removal, aiding in maintaining basic metabolic balance. Worse than an undamaged natural kidney.

HediffDef.label: animal prosthetic liver
HediffDef.description: An installed animal prosthetic liver offering rudimentary detoxification functions. Despite its simplicity, it provides a straightforward solution for metabolic regulation. Worse than an undamaged natural liver.

HediffDef.label: animal power claw
HediffDef.description: An installed combat-oriented paw replacement consisting of a hooked claw extending besides the animal's original limb. It cuts deep, and it is strong enough to crush a skull like a hand crushes an egg. Its overall ungainliness slows down movement slightly.
HediffDef.extraTooltip: Provides a Scratch attack doubling the strength of the animal's original paw attack, with the same cooldown.

HediffDef.label: animal prosthetic beak
HediffDef.description: An installed animal prosthetic beak built with simple materials. Should be able to replace almost any avian-like beak.

HediffDef.label: animal prosthetic tentacle
HediffDef.description: An installed animal prosthetic tentacle built with simple materials. Should be able to replace almost any tentacle, though they'll be quite rigid and not very functional, specially if the animal uses it for locomotion.

HediffDef.label: animal prosthetic buoyancy mechanism
HediffDef.description: An installed animal prosthetic buoyancy mechanism built with simple materials. Should be able to replace hydrogen sacs and other exotic organs keeping hovering creatures in the air.

HediffDef.label: animal prosthetic shell
HediffDef.description: An installed animal prosthetic shell constructed from basic, durable materials, providing essential protection and structural support. Though simple in design, it offers a practical solution for shielding the animal from harm.

HediffDef.label: animal prosthetic wing
HediffDef.description: An installed animal prosthetic wing made from basic, sturdy materials, offering essential support for limited flight and gliding. Though simple, it provides a functional solution for basic aerial mobility. Note that base game birds DON'T have wings (yes, really).

HediffDef.label: animal prosthetic blade
HediffDef.description: An installed animal prosthetic blade made from basic, sturdy materials. Will replace a range of biological structures such as single claws (not claws that are part of a paw, for example) and an insect's headclaw.
HediffDef.extraTooltip: Provides a Cut attack with a strength 50% higher than the animal's original claw attack, and same cooldown.

HediffDef.label: animal prosthetic stinger
HediffDef.description: An installed animal prosthetic stinger made from basic, sturdy materials and designed to replace a lost or damaged stinger.
HediffDef.extraTooltip: Provides a Toxic Buildup attack with a strength 50% higher than the animal's original claw attack, and same cooldown.

HediffDef.label: animal prosthetic horn
HediffDef.description: An installed animal prosthetic horn acting as a synthetic replacement for a lost or damaged horn, crafted from durable materials to restore natural appearance and function.
HediffDef.extraTooltip: Provides a Blunt attack with a strength 50% higher than the animal's original claw attack, and same cooldown.

HediffDef.label: animal painstopper
HediffDef.description: An installed animal painstopper implant. While it does allow the user to accomplish more, it turns out pain has a purpose. When you don't feel it, you can get hurt really bad really easily.

HediffDef.label: animal controller
HediffDef.description: An installed animal controller implant. This implant will allow this creature to be drafted and controlled by the player. Counts as a prosthetic when considering animal body size to be installed.

HediffDef.label: animal pouncing leg
HediffDef.description: An installed animal pouncing leg. Engineered with high-tension springs and advanced composite materials, it enables the animal to make precise, powerful leaps.

HediffDef.label: animal thermoregulator
HediffDef.description: An installed animal thermoregulator implant using sensors and adaptive materials to maintain optimal body temperature in varying environmental conditions, enhancing the animal's ability to thrive in extreme heat or cold.

HediffDef.label: animal chemfuel nodules
HediffDef.description: An installed animal implant that adds several chemfuel nodules to the animal's skin. These nodules contain unstable chemfuel and will explode upon the animal's death.
